name: jackknife
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a truck that has two parts jackknifes, one part moves around so far towards the other part that it cannot be driven: The oil tanker jackknifed after skidding on the ice.

(KNIFE)

a knife with one or more blades that fold into the handle, which fits into a person’s pocket
jackknife verb [I]
(MAKE AN ANGLE)
to bend in half, or bend so the parts make a sharp angle: A truck jackknifed on Route 80 this morning.
